public class ShiftService
extends SecureService
    Class for creating shifts Parameter date needs to be on correct format

      • getShifts

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.util.ArrayList<ShiftUserAvailability> getShifts(@QueryParam(value="daysForward")
                                                                                                        int daysForward,
                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="date")
                                                                                                        java.sql.Date date,
                                                                                                        @DefaultValue(value="-1") @QueryParam(value="deptId")
                                                                                                        int deptId)
        Fetches shifts for an employee using the session userId
        Parameters:
        daysForward - how many days forward to get shifts
        date - the date to start from when fetching shifts
        deptId - the ID of the department (default set to -1)
        Returns:
        Arraylist of ShiftUserAvailability objects

        oldUserId - - the ID of the employee who previously worked on this shift
